title: Cheese, potato and onion pie
description: The rich pastry in this cheese pie is very tender and almost melts into the filling beneath. Serve this as a meat-free main course, with some steamed greens or a big bowl of salad.
ingredients: 75g/2½oz cold unsalted butter, cut into roughly 1cm/½in dice
75g/2½oz white vegetable fat, cut into small pieces
1kg/2lb 4oz Desiree potatoes, peeled and cut into large chunks
